snippet.title: "Slice Of Death" | Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now!
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2491500?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=reveal
itch.io: https://hastilyassembled.itch.io/tfma-slice-of-death

My shift was almost over, but I had one more pizza to deliver. Unfortunately, my destination was the creepy manor on the outskirts of town. Little did I know that my night was about to take a turn for the terrifying. This is my true story of deadly traps, knife-wielding cultists, and demonic sacrifices; but how it all ended will shock you the most…

Find us here:
http://tinyletter.com/HastilyAssembled
https://twitter.com/HastilyAssemble
https://hastilyassembled.com

#IndieGame #screenshotsaturday #HorrorGame  #MadeWithUnity #announcement #trailer #indiedev
